title: Leading Nuclear Energy Producer
description: In 2023, France generated 64.17% of its electricity from nuclear sources, making it one of the top countries in the world for nuclear energy production.

title: Near-Universal Female Primary Enrollment
description: As of 2016, France achieved a 99.65% adjusted net enrollment rate for primary school-aged girls, showcasing its commitment to female education.

title: Minimal Female School Dropout Rates
description: In 2016, only 0.03% of primary school-aged girls in France were out of school, highlighting the country's success in keeping young girls in education.

title: Low Internal Displacement Figures
description: By 2022, France had only 10 internally displaced persons, indicating a stable domestic environment with minimal forced displacement.
